message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.SY 

This paper belongs to the computer science sub-category of security and cryptography (cs.CR) as it discusses a security game called FlipIt and proposes an adaptive reinforcement learning strategy to improve security against advanced persistent threats. Additionally, the paper uses Markov Decision Processes and temporal difference reinforcement learning, which are common techniques in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also analyzes the convergence of the proposed strategy, which is related to game theory (cs.GT) and control systems (cs.SY).
